titleStmt.title: Animadversions on Mr. Hill's book entituled, A vindication of the primitive fathers, against the imputations of Gilbert, Lord Bishop of Sarum in a letter to a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Allix, Pierre, 1641-1717.

notesStmt.note: Written by P. Allix. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); DNB.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
